abstract: The autopsy on the film director showed a “theraputic level” of an anti-depressant, as well as a sleep aid. Mr. Scott died on Aug. 19 after jumping off a bridge in Los Angeles.
snippet: The autopsy on the film director showed a “theraputic level” of an anti-depressant, as well as a sleep aid. Mr. Scott died on Aug. 19 after jumping off a bridge in Los Angeles.
lead_paragraph: 7:51 p.m. | Updated LOS ANGELES — The director Tony Scott’s death was officially declared a suicide on Monday, as the Los Angeles County coroner released a brief summary of the findings in the case.

headline.main: Coroner Officially Declares Tony Scott Death a Suicide
